items.content_html: A lightweight CLI tool to quickly check if a specific host:port combination is open. It attempts a direct TCP connection with a configurable (5-second default) timeout, returning a clear success or failure message. Perfect for troubleshooting network connectivity or verifying service ports.
items.title: vinipickrodt/check-connection: A lightweight CLI tool to quickly check if a specific host:port combination is open. It attempts a direct TCP connection with a configurable (5-second default) timeout, returning a clear success or failure message. Perfect for troubleshooting network connectivity or verifying service ports.
